title: Puzzle/Platform/Casual - Music Pack
description: Music Pack designed for problem solving, puzzles, bubbles, platforms and other adventures.
longDescription:
Music Pack designed for problem solving, puzzles, bubbles, platforms and other adventures.

This pack contains 46 files: 10 full tracks, loops, variations and ambients.


more than 50 minutes of quality music.
